```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# Reading the Data

gdp_data <- read.csv("../datasets/gdp_data.csv")
pollution_data <- read.csv("../datasets/pollution_data.csv")
```

```{r}
# Merged Data

merged_data <- left_join(gdp_data, pollution_data, by = c('REF_DATE', 'GEO'))
merged_data
```

```{r}
# Preliminary Regressions Run

reg1 <- lm(log(VALUE.y) ~ VALUE.x + (VALUE.x)^2, data = merged_data)
summary(reg1)
```
